doc.title: 16mm Mystery
doc.plot: The concept was inspired by artist Christian Jankowski's memory of a Baroque painting. 16 mm Mystery portrays the overwhelming power of motion picture imagery. A man walks through the city carrying a projector and a screen. When he sets up the 16mm film on a rooftop, he changes the skyline forever.

The concept was inspired by artist Christian Jankowski's memory of a Baroque painting. 16 mm Mystery portrays the overwhelming power of motion picture imagery. A man walks through the city carrying a projector and a screen. When he sets up the 16mm film on a rooftop, he changes the skyline forever.
